learning_objectives.guidance: Total cost (TC), average total cost (ATC), fixed cost (FC), variable cost (VC), average fixed cost (AFC), average variable cost (AVC). Note: marginal cost is not required.
Calculation of TC, ATC, FC, VC, AFC and AVC. Definition, drawing and interpretation of diagrams that show how changes in output affect costs of production.
Total revenue (TR) and average revenue (AR). Note: marginal revenue is not required.
Calculation of TR and AR. The influence of sales on revenue.
Survival, social welfare, profit maximisation and growth.
